skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 10% of the damage inflicted. 

Cannot decrease a single enemy’s MAX HP by more than 50%.
skills.name: Elders' Judgment
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of fully depleting the target’s Turn Meter.
skills.name: Crushing Eternity
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% and heals them by 15% of the damage inflicted if this attack is critical.
skills.name: Righteous Evocation
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Heal +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Heal +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: If this Champion has 2 or fewer buffs at the start of the turn, places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Boonchant [P]
